mapper.select: select ranking.num, ranking.nick, ranking.sum from( select rank() over(order by avg(w_rate) desc) as num, round(avg(w_rate), 1) as sum, m.m_nick as nick from review r, member m where m.m_type = 1 and r.id_rated = m.m_id group by r.id_rated order by num ) as ranking where ranking.num <= 50 order by ranking.num
